original_text: And when they had prayed, the place in which they were gathered together was shaken, and they were all filled with the Holy Spirit and continued to speak the word of God with boldness.
korean_text: 빌기를 다하매 모인 곳이 진동하더니 무리가 다 성령이 충만하여 담대히 하나님의 말씀을 전하니라

sentences.original_text: the place in which they were gathered together was shaken
and they were all filled with the Holy Spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 다 성령으로 가득 찼습니다

sentences.original_text: and continued to speak the word of God with boldness.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 담대히 하나님의 말씀을 계속 말했습니다
